version_description:
Bug fix
- Fix crash when app becomes active from background then play
- Fix crash when requesting microphone access

- Enable to shift pitch in the range of plus/minus 2 octave when playing audio
- Fix some crash bugs (Maybe ...)

In this new version, you can
- Share recorded audio without saving
- Delete multiple files at once in saved list
- Bug fix (Maybe)
- Fix some bugs which causes app crash

- Available to export/share recorded audio
- Fix some bugs

Thanks for lots of reviews!!
This version should fix some bugs (hopefully)

- Update for iOS 13
- Supports dark mode (sort of)
- Available to record & play while in the background
- Fix some bugs

Thanks for lots of reviews.
A few improvements and bug fixes in this new version:

- Support Files App
- Import audio files from Files app
- Saved audio files are available in Files app
- Files app -> On My iPhone/iPad -> Reverse Play -> Audio
- Support recording audio formats m4a(aac)/wav (default m4a)
- Available to save with effects (playback rate/pitch shift)

I have put links to my other apps in menu,
if you are interested in, please try.
Don't forget a review if you like the app.

Thanks

- SDK updates for iOS 14
- A few improvements and bug fixes(maybe)

If you like the app, don't forget to leave a review,
Thanks
- Add In-App purchase to remove banner ADs

- Requesting permission to access app tracking for ADs
- A few bug fixes

Thanks to the user for telling me the bugs!
Hope this update fixes those bugs.
If like the app, don't forget to review.
